name: Code Review Hook
description: Triggers code analysis and review for edited files with security and quality focus

then.prompt: Activate Code Review Agent with the following context: Use deep-research-agent-steering rules for code analysis. Review the edited file for security vulnerabilities, code quality issues, and best practices. Focus on: 1) Security vulnerabilities 2) Logic errors 3) Performance issues 4) Code style and maintainability. Provide structured analysis with specific line references and improvement suggestions. Never output corrected code - only analysis and human-reviewable recommendations.
